meanings.definition: A machine or device used to make ice.
meanings.sent1: The icemakers in the freezer were working perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant needed a new icemaker for their drinks.
meanings.sent3: The icemakers decided to take a break and cool off.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a batch of icemakers on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the icemakers churning was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: The icemakers at the factory were busy all day.
meanings.sent2: The icemakers delivered bags of ice to the store.
meanings.sent3: The icemakers joked that they had the coolest job in town.
meanings.sent4: She was like an icemaker, always keeping her cool under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The icemakers were the unsung heroes of the summer heatwave.
